title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt. The focus is misplaced to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so because the focus immediately jumps to the library file node.
EB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the item should be successfully selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label to the library file. 2. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view. 3. Verify that the label item cannot be selected on the first attempt and the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
